abstract: Indonesian Transportation Ministry announces that it is suspending several officials for letting AirAsia Flight 8501 take off from Surabaya, Indonesia; officials say flight did not have all required clearances and that they have put in place regulations requiring airlines in the country to inform pilots of weather conditions prior to each takeoff.
lead_paragraph: The Indonesian Transportation Ministry said it was suspending several officials for allowing Flight 8501, which crashed in the Java Sea, to fly.
snippet: The Indonesian Transportation Ministry said it was suspending several officials for allowing Flight 8501, which crashed in the Java Sea, to fly.

headline.main: AirAsia Jet Was Cleared to Take Off Without All Permits in Order, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Lost Jet Was Cleared to Take Off Without All Permits in Order, Officials Say
